Hi Friends üëã,

Welcome To aGuideHub!

To make mui typography underline on hover in React js, you can use this code sx={{ textDecoration: 'none', '&:hover': { textDecoration: 'underline' } }}. It will make mui typography underline on hover in react js.

Today, I am going to show you, how to make mui typography underline on hover in react js.

Installation

Install the following packages to use mui typography in react js.

npm

npm install @mui/material @emotion/react @emotion/styled

yarn

yarn add @mui/material @emotion/react @emotion/styled

Table of contents

  • Install MUI and create a new React app.
  • Import Material-UI Typography.
  • Make mui typography underline on hover Component.

Step 1: Install MUI and create a new React app.

First you have to install the React project. You should use create-react-app command to create a new React project.

npx create-react-app my-app
cd my-app
npm start

Step 2: Import Material-UI Typography.

After installing MUI, you have to import your React component. To do this, add the following line to the top of your component file.

import { Typography } from '@mui/material';

Step 3: Make mui typography underline on hover Component.

If you want to see the underline after hovering over the text, then first you have to use textDecoration: 'none' css code and then '&:hover': { textDecoration: 'underline'} By using this css code, you underline will appear on hovering the text.

<Typography variant="h6" sx={{ textDecoration: 'none', '&:hover': { textDecoration: 'underline' } }}>
      Hello my dear friend.
</Typography>

MUI material make mui typography underline on hover example.

The code below is an example of making mui typography underline on hover, setting the sx={{ textDecoration: 'none', '&:hover': { textDecoration: 'underline' } }} will create an typography in a underline on hover.

App.js

import { Typography } from '@mui/material';

export default function App() {
  return (
    <Typography variant="h6" sx={{ textDecoration: 'none', '&:hover': { textDecoration: 'underline' } }}>
      Hello my dear friend.
    </Typography>
  );
}

In the above code example, I have used the @mui/material component and made mui typography underline on hover in react js.

Check the output of the above code example.
